mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product WHERE accommodation_id = #{accommodationId} ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM product_image WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY product_image_id ASC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_standard_number, p.product_maximum_number, p.product_count, p.product_check_in_time, p.product_check_out_time,
pf.has_bath, pf.has_air_condition, pf.has_refrigerator, pf.has_bidet, pf.has_tv, pf.has_pc, pf.has_internet, pf.has_toiletries,
ARRAY_AGG(pi.product_image_url ORDER BY pi.product_image_id) AS images FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_facility pf ON pf.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN product_image pi ON pi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.accommodation_id = #{accommodationId} GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_standard_number, p.product_maximum_number, p.product_count, p.product_check_in_time, p.product_check_out_time, pf.has_bath, pf.has_air_condition, pf.has_refrigerator, pf.has_bidet, pf.has_tv, pf.has_pc, pf.has_internet, pf.has_toiletries ORDER BY p.product_id

SELECT p.product_id FROM product p LEFT JOIN reservation r ON r.product_id = p.product_id AND r.status IN ('confirmed', 'paid', 'completed') AND r.check_out_date > #{checkInDate} AND r.check_in_date < #{checkOutDate} WHERE p.accommodation_id = #{accommodationId} GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_count HAVING COUNT(r.reservation_id) < p.product_count ORDER BY p.product_id
